title: Calories in Dunkin Munchkins
meta_description: Discover calories in Dunkin Munchkins per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, and nutrition breakdowns for popular flavors.
assumptions: Assorted glazed donut holes, fried; standard serving of 4 pieces (~20 g each); no fillings unless noted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and location. Check Dunkin app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 4 Dunkin Munchkins has about 280 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Dunkin Munchkin?
What are the carbs in Dunkin Munchkins?
faqs.a: 4 Munchkins have ~34 g carbs, mainly from sugars and flour.

faqs.q: Are Dunkin Munchkins high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~15 g total fat in 4, with 7 g saturated from frying.

faqs.q: Calories in a dozen Dunkin Munchkins?
faqs.a: Around 840 kcal for 12 assorted glazed Munchkins.

faqs.q: Do flavors affect calories in Dunkin Munchkins?
faqs.a: Yes, filled or frosted varieties add 10-20 kcal per piece.
